div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 662 Stancuta, c. 39 km. SSW of Braila, Rumania, 1953 Burial: after 52 B.C. Contents: 87+ AR. In AR vessel with AR ingots Thasos: 53 spread-flan tetradr. incl. imit. Roman Rep.: 34 den. Disposition: Bucharest (Inst. Arch.) Preda, SCN 2 (1958), pp. 239-51, illus.
